oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some combinatorial number theory problems over finite valuation rings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Van Thang, Pham
Vinh, Le Anh
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Combinatorics
Mathematics - Number Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let $\mathcal{R}$ be a finite valuation ring of order $q^r$. In this paper we generalize and improve several well-known results, which were studied over finite fields $\mathbb{F}_q$ and finite cyclic rings $\mathbb{Z}/p^r\mathbb{Z}$, in the setting of finite valuation rings.
